segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me where Peking University is on this map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I can ’ t because I ’ m a stranger here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . You can ask the policeman over there .
segments.speaker: S2
